attributes.title: Honest person
attributes.review: This app all honestly isn’t good, it gave my phone roaches, downloaded a virus, and hacked into my personal info. I thought tik tok was stealing info and sending it to China but, no it’s this app that’s doing all the stealing and sending my info.

attributes.title: WORST APP (not as bad as the president though)
attributes.review: This app takes for ever to download and I thought I would give me real information but instead it’s just preaching how amazing trump is. I did not download this app to see fake news!!!

attributes.title: Bad app.
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I saw multiple pictures of Donald’s mouth. His crusty dusty nasty mouth. I don’t know about you, but I don’t want to have to look at that things mouth. The final picture I saw was Donald on a toilet eating a cockroach. I am ✨shocked✨

attributes.title: Don't download, its horrible.
attributes.review: I think k this app deserves to be deleted! It's is worst then a game that Laggs, I hate it! It's disgusting and I hope that you delete this. My information can be hooked away because of this stupid app!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i was deeply disappointed when i discovered that this is an app for donald trump 🤢 and not trumpet sounds. this app asks for way too much personal information and i feel that they are collecting our data

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.userName: Do I have to be here
attributes.review: This app takes weeks to download and it’s really glitchy and gives away your personal information

attributes.title: Worst app get this off!!!😤👏
attributes.review: Bro this app is so bad pls get this off the App Store..this is so dumb this needs to get off the app!!this takes forever to load..it takes forever to download..and I have good WiFi so it’s not me!!also 😍✨🧚🏼‍♀️Trump 2020🧚🏼‍♀️💗✨but on a grave stone😗✨🧚🏼‍♀️💖

attributes.title: UGH
attributes.review: Not only did this app take HOURS to download BUT when I finally got on the app to show my support i was met with a screenshot of LEGAL documents claiming my amazing President is a RAPIST!?! Im so mad at this app. Oh to see without my eyes👩🏽‍🦯 Everything he say’s is taken out of context😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: my phone is in the toilet!!
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app because i heard through tiktok about how much of an amazing app this is 🥰 so of course i wanted to follow these amazing trends that surface the area 🤠 when i downloaded the app it brought me to a black screen 😳 and up popped out mr cheeto himself ! i screamed and panicked so hard that i flushed my phone down the toilet on accident 🤪 woops! donald trump owns me a new phone now because i’m using my toaster to type this review 😘

attributes.title: Terrible app horrendous
attributes.review: This is the worst app everrrrr!!!! I could not be more unsatisfied and I have never ever been so frustrated out of such a terrible app. I hate this app and want it to be removed please and thank you. It is really really really terrible.
